description: This third-year-level course aims to increase the knowledge of Japanese people, language, and society by comparing with students' own cultures in their target language. Various authentic "texts" (images, video clips, written texts, etc.) support student learning. Counts toward management studies concentration. Prerequisite: JAPAN 232 or equivalent.
name: Advanced Japanese I
